seg.source: 美国支持的部队宣布他们已从伊斯兰国手中夺回曼比季
seg.translation: US-backed troops announced that they have recaptured Manbij from ISIS
U.S.-backed troops have announced they have recaptured Mambitti from the Islamic State.
U.S.-backed forces announce they have recaptured Manbij from ISIS

seg.source: 部队发言人于周五表示，城内残留的伊斯兰国士兵已全部离开，美国支持的部队已完全控制土耳其边境附近的北部城市曼比季。
seg.translation: A military spokesperson expressed on Friday that the remaining Islamic State fighters have completely withdrawn. US-backed forces have gained complete control over the northern city of Manbij near the Turkish border.

A spokesman for the force said in Friday that the remaining Islamist soldiers in the city had all left, and the United States-backed forces had fully controlled the northern city of Manchester, near the Turkish border.
All remaining ISIS soldiers in the city have left and U.S.-backed forces have taken full control of the northern city of Manbij, near the Turkish border, a force spokesman said on Friday.

seg.source: 在躲进城内的激进分子离开后，叙利亚民主力量 (SDF) 现在正在对全城进行扫荡。
seg.translation: Now that radicals hiding in the city have left, the Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF) are conducting a crackdown of the entire city.
The Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF) are now sweeping through the city after the militants who have been hiding in town have left.
The Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF) are now sweeping the city after the departure of militants holed up inside the city.

seg.source: 叙利亚民主力量同盟曼比季军事委员会的莎兰·达尔维什告诉路透社，他们已解救了2,000多名被激进分子劫持的平民。
seg.translation: Sharfan Darwish of the Manbij Military Council of the Syrian Democratic Forces told Reuters that they have rescued over 2,000 civilians who were abducted by extremists.
莎兰·达尔维什 of the Syrian Democratic Forces, the Manchester military commission, told Reuters that they had rescued more than 2,000 civilians abducted by militants.
Sharan Darwish of the Manbij Military Council, an ally of the Syrian Democratic Forces, told Reuters that they had rescued more than 2,000 civilians who had been abducted by militants.

seg.source: 他告诉路透社：“曼比季现在全在我们的控制之下，但我们仍在进行扫荡。”
seg.translation: He told Reuters: “The entirety of Manbij is currently under our control, but we’re still implementing sweeps.”
He told Reuters: "The Mann season is all under our control, but we are still sweeping it." ”
"Manbij is all under our control now, but we're still in the middle of a sweep," he told Reuters.
